t: Califia Farms Raises $225 Million In Funding As It Aims To Rule The Plant-Based Dairy Market
s: February 4, 2020 - Fast forward to today, Califia Farms has become the most recognizable brand in the plant-based dairy aisle. Fresh off today’s Series D funding round of $225 million, led by the Qatar Investment Authority (QIA), Califia has its sights set on global domination.
